title: Understanding Virality: A Rubric based Vision-Language Model Framework for Short-Form Edutainment Evaluation
summary: Evaluating short-form video content requires moving beyond surface-level quality metrics toward human-aligned, multimodal reasoning. While existing frameworks like VideoScore-2 assess visual and semantic fidelity, they do not capture how specific audiovisual attributes drive real audience engagement.
